R

registerPerson(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
Calls createSockets() in preparation to sending a Package command; Sends out the package using the ObjectOutputStream variable; The method waits for the result (Person object with persistence only generated data) which it received using the ObjectInputStream variable; The socket connection is closed and the result is being returned.
registerPerson(Person) - Method in class server.ModelManager
Method used to register a new User of the system; A Package object is being created with the command "registerPerson" and the parameter is being added/attached to the Package; It then refers to the DatabaseConnectionTier2 variable that transmits the Package command for execution.
registerPerson(Person) - Method in class server.PartyPlannerService
Method used for the registration of a new user of the system; The Person parameter is provided by the web service and serialized using JSON; It references the ModelManager object to execute the command and retrive the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a Person object, meaning the object has been created successfully or null, meaning the procedure failed and was aborted
removeItem(Party, Item) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to remove an Item from a Party in the system identified through the parameter Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
removeItem() - Method in class database.DatabaseAccessTest
 
removeItem(Item) - Method in class domain.Package
Method that removes an item from the List * @param item
removeItems(List<Item>, Party) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to remove a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method removeItem for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
removeItems(List<Item>, Party) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
removeItems(List<Item>, Party) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to remove the List from the Party specified as parameter from the system; The method returns a string reflecting the success of the procedure;
removeItems(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
 
removeItems(Party) - Method in class server.ModelManager
 
removeParticipant(Party, Person) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to remove a user (Person) as a participant from the party parameter in the system; Procedure: Enables the connection to the database; Sends the command in SQL format; Closes the connection; IF the command has been executed with no issues the method will return "success" and "fail" otherwise
removeParticipant(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
 
removeParty(Party) - Method in class domain.Package
Method that removes a party from the List
removePeople(List<Person>, Party) - Method in class database.DatabaseAccess
Method used to remove a List to the Party given as parameter in the database; It calls successively the method removeParticipant for all objects in the list If one add fails the method returns "fail" and aborts the procedure and "success" in the opposite case;
removePeople(List<Person>, Party) - Method in interface database.DatabaseCon
 
removePeople(List<Person>, Party) - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
References the DatabaseCon variable to remove the List parameter to the Party parameter in the system; The method returns a string reflecting the success of the procedure;
removePeople(Package) - Method in class server.DatabaseConnectionTier2
Calls createSockets() in preparation to sending a Package command; Sends out the package using the ObjectOutputStream variable; The method waits for the result (String) which it received using the ObjectInputStream variable; The socket connection is closed and the result is being returned.
removePerson(Person) - Method in class domain.Package
Method that removes a person object from the List
removeString(String) - Method in class domain.Package
Removes a string object from the List
run() - Method in class model.DatabaseConnectionTier3
Method inherited from the Runnable interface; Called when a Socket connection is being established; A Package is being read/received using the ObjectInputStream variable; In a switch the command property of the Package is being identified.
